house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1981 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) and approximately 1538 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include view, private pool, patio, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: The Keyes Company, Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Dishwasher, Ocean Access, Smoke Detector, Tennis Court(s)
